<br>

ISEE is proud to have productive partnerships with two leading environment health journals: [Environmental Epidemiology](https://journals.lww.com/environepidem/pages/default.aspx){target="_blank"}, and [Environmental Health Perspectives (EHP)](https://ehp.niehs.nih.gov/){target="_blank"}. 

<br>

Environmental Epidemiology is the official journal of the ISEE. ISEE members enjoy special benefits from this journal including online access, discounted article processing charges, and increased dissemination of published papers. ISEE regularly invites and sponsors commentaries that are published in this journal. 

<br>

ISEE and EHP enjoy a mutually beneficial partnership including joint planning of conference, early career, capacity building, and educational activities. EHP typically also publishes the abstracts from the ISEE annual meeting.
